basics.name: Sabal K.C.
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a software engineer with experience in backend development, web scraping, and web3 integration. I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from Pulchowk campus, IOE, Nepal. I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science from the University of Houston, Texas. I have over 3 years of experience in software development, having worked with various technologies like Golang, NodeJS, React, and Puppeteer to name a few. I am seeking opportunities to work on challenging projects that require a mix of backend and frontend development.

work.name: Dapi
work.position: Software Engineer - Backend and Web Scraping
work.summary: I worked as a software engineer at Dapi, specializing in Golang and web scraping with NodeJS + puppeteer. Dapi is a Y Combinator-backed fintech company that makes payments simple. Dapi's mission is to build the financial technology infrastructure for the next generation of financial services. Dapi operates in the Middle East, USA, and LatAm.

work.name: Okhati solutions
work.summary: I gained experience with both frontend (React, Redux) and backend (Node, Express) in an EMR(Electronic medical record) software, used by clinics, labs & hospitals that also included patient-flow management, billing, accounting, reporting, bulk messaging and many other features.

otherWork.name: Ibriz.AI
otherWork.summary: I worked as a full-stack developer, primarily in the frontend with React. I was involved in the development and maintenance of multiple web3 projects, which included integration of wallets and smart contracts in Ethereum, ICON, Tezos blockchain.
